        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        Once the user chooses to start the algorithm, we let he/she choose the color to paint the final path. Or let the user obtain information on a tapped tile.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        progress - The progress of the thread itself.
        fromUser - Boolean variable from the action of the user.
